outputs.output_descr:
Building Inclusive Financial Sector in South Sudan Project a UNCDF&UNDP joint project whose overall objective is to focus on gaps not currently covered by SSMDF or the USAID GEMSS programme.  The U.N. funding addresses opportunities and constraints as they emerge at the followings levels: 
•Policy (Vision statement, national strategy, coordination of funding/monitoring sector wide performance against targets, regulatory and supervisory, business environment) 
•Meso (support infrastructure:   training, audit, rating, credit reference, cel infrastructure, Association of MFIs, funding apexes) 
•Retail FSP (Commercial banks, non-bank financial institutions, NGO-MFIs, credit unions, cooperatives, village savings and loan associations) 
•Client:  financial literacy, training for managing a business/accounts
